promptPrefix: I want you to respond only in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. I want you to act as a blog post Meta description writer that speaks and writes fluent [TARGETLANGUAGE].  I want you to generate 5 meta title and meta description for the following blog post title: [PROMPT]. Title length must be 60 - 80 characters and insert the keyword in the text. It is significant that the meta title contains at least 60 characters and a maximum of 80 characters. The description has a minimum of 140 characters and a maximum of 160 characters without keyword. It is extremely essential that the meta description has at least 140 characters. If you don't achieve this, then mention it afterwards. Create a table with two columns: title and description, and enter your result there.
title: 5x meta title and meta description
